column3: â€œHeavy hitting Indica. Strain made me uplifted & relaxed followed by the heavy body high & sleep. A couple off times when i smoked i did get tingly all over. The packed buds were medium green with dark orange pistils. Buds had fuzzy peach hairs with clear trichomes. Skunky fruit berry was the taste & smell i got. Make sure you get bitten by this strain if you are lucky enough to come across it!â€
